https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q3NdckfHKjXyrsRNoZyAidMf9em.jpg Cherry Bomb follows teenagers Luke, Malachy, and Michelle as they embark on a wild weekend of drink, drugs, shop-lifting and stealing cars. But what starts out as a game turns deadly serious when the three discover that they can't get off the wild ride they've set in motion. Cherrybomb
